name: Touhou Mini Map
description:
Game play

1. Get points by combining map blocks
2. The map area can be unlocked once the integral requirements are met
3. The number of map blocks in the game is increased by combining the same plots




Game features

1. Each region has distinctive buildings in the Touhou world
2. Each region can unlock the unique Touhou characters in that region
3. The game process is easy and the Touhou characters are lovely
